mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEC_ROLE ( ROLE_ID , ROLE_KEY , ROLE_NAME , ROLE_DESC , CREATE_USER , CREATE_DATE , CAN_MODIFY , LAST_UPDATE_DATE, AUTO_ASSIGN, VISIBLE) VALUES (#{roleId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , #{roleKey} , #{roleName} , #{roleDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{createUser} , SYSDATE() , #{canModify,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{autoAssign,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{visible,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update: UPDATE SEC_ROLE SET ROLE_NAME = #{roleName} , ROLE_KEY = #{roleKey} , ROLE_DESC = #{roleDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAN_MODIFY = #{canModify}, AUTO_ASSIGN = #{autoAssign}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE= SYSDATE(), VISIBLE = #{visible} WHERE ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SEC_ROLE WHERE CAN_MODIFY = 1 and ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
mapper.select: SELECT ROLE_ID , ROLE_KEY , ROLE_NAME , ROLE_DESC , CREATE_USER , CREATE_DATE , CAN_MODIFY , LAST_UPDATE_DATE, AUTO_ASSIGN, VISIBLE FROM SEC_ROLE WHERE ROLE_KEY = #{value}
SELECT ROLE_ID , ROLE_KEY , ROLE_NAME , ROLE_DESC , CREATE_USER , CREATE_DATE , CAN_MODIFY , LAST_UPDATE_DATE, AUTO_ASSIGN, VISIBLE FROM SEC_ROLE WHERE ROLE_NAME = #{value}

SELECT * FROM SEC_ROLE
VISIBLE = '1'
and ROLE_KEY = #{params.roleKey}
and ROLE_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{params.roleName})),'%')
and ROLE_DESC like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{params.roleDesc})),'%')
and ROLE_ID in (select ROLE_ID from SEC_DEPARTMENT_ROLE where department_id=#{params.departmentId})
SELECT ROLE.* FROM SEC_ROLE ROLE, SEC_STAFF_DEPARTMENT_ROLE SDR WHERE ROLE.ROLE_ID = SDR.ROLE_ID AND SDR.STAFF_ID = #{staffId} UNION SELECT * FROM SEC_ROLE WHERE AUTO_ASSIGN = '1'
SELECT ROLE.* FROM SEC_ROLE ROLE, SEC_DEPARTMENT_ROLE DR WHERE DR.ROLE_ID = ROLE.ROLE_ID AND DEPARTMENT_ID = #{value} ORDER BY CONVERT(ROLE_NAME USING GBK)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEC_ROLE_RESOURCE_OPERATION ( ROLE_ID , RESOURCE_ID , OPERATION_KEY ) VALUES (#{roleId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} , #{resourceId} , #{operationKey})
